name: docker-storage-gc

scripts.lint: balena-lint -t tsconfig.dev.json -e ts -e js lib test tools
scripts.lint-fix: balena-lint --fix  -t tsconfig.dev.json -e ts -e js lib test tools
scripts.pretest: npm run prepare && docker rm -vf docker-storage-gc-tests && docker run --privileged --name docker-storage-gc-tests -v /tmp/dind:/var/run/ -d docker:24.0.5-dind && sleep 5 && docker exec docker-storage-gc-tests chown $(id -u) /var/run/docker.sock
scripts.posttest: docker rm -vf docker-storage-gc-tests && npm run lint

description: Automatically cleanup unused images based on various cache replacement algorithms
